snippet.title: Rooting your Kindle Fire: a cautionary tale concluded
snippet.description: Learn how a supposedly bricked Kindle Fire was resuscitated in the second part of a discussion on how to root it and install the full Android operating system.

snippet.title: Apple v. Google: The goliath deathmatch by the numbers in 2014
snippet.description: The challenge in analyzing the Apple v. Google rivalry is deciding which metrics to use. Here are four data points to get a grip on who's winning.

snippet.title: Rooting your Kindle Fire: A cautionary tale
snippet.description: It's possible to make a Kindle Fire even more powerful by rooting it and installing a full Android version, but there are some dangers involved.

snippet.title: How a hand-me-down Kindle Fire became an IT guy's favorite tool
snippet.description: The first generation Kindle Fire is an oldie but a goodie, according to one IT guy who has given it new life after inheriting it from his kid.

snippet.title: Rethinking the iPad: A formula to make it useful if you're already savvy on a laptop and smartphone
snippet.description: If you're already highly efficient with a laptop and a smartphone, a tablet can feel awkward and redundant. Here's a way to play to its strengths.

snippet.title: The quest for the perfect to-do list
snippet.description: There are numerous options out there for electronic task management. Read about one system administrator's search for the ultimate solution.

snippet.title: Five Microsoft Surface apps that are ideal for travel
snippet.description: Brien Posey shares five of his favorite apps for the Microsoft Surface tablet that he likes to use when he travels by airplane.

snippet.title: Hands-on with the Dell Venue 8 Pro
snippet.description: Find out what Patrick Gray thinks about Dell's Venue 8 Pro after spending two weeks with the device and using it in a business travel setting.

snippet.title: Tackling the usage of DRM and textbooks
snippet.description: Tony McSherry looks at DRM and the electronic publishing of textbooks.

snippet.title: A 2014 tablet strategy for CIOs
snippet.description: Will Kelly offers some suggestions to CIOs for formulating a tablet strategy in 2014.
